scripts.init: npm run bootstrap && npx cross-env INIT=true node scripts/init.js
scripts.clean: npx lerna clean -y && npx lerna exec -- rm -rf .serverless
scripts.build: npx lerna exec --scope sls-* sls package
scripts.build:api: npx lerna exec --scope sls-api-* sls package
scripts.build:resources: npx lerna exec --scope sls-resources-* sls package
scripts.build:resources:api: npx lerna exec --scope sls-resources-api sls package
scripts.build:web: npx lerna exec --scope sls-web npm run build
scripts.deploy: npx lerna exec --scope sls-* sls deploy
scripts.deploy:fresh: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:api: npx lerna exec --scope sls-api-* sls deploy
scripts.deploy:resources: npx lerna exec --scope sls-resources-* sls deploy
scripts.deploy:resources:api: npx lerna exec --scope sls-resources-api sls deploy
scripts.deploy:web: npx lerna exec --scope sls-web sls deploy
scripts.remove: npm run remove:api && npm run remove:resources && npm run remove:web
scripts.remove:api: npx lerna exec --scope sls-api-* sls remove
scripts.remove:resources:api: npx lerna exec --scope sls-resources-api sls remove
scripts.remove:resources: npx lerna exec --scope sls-resources-* sls remove
scripts.remove:web: npx lerna exec --scope sls-web sls remove
scripts.docker:deploy: docker run --rm juquinha:latest npm run deploy
